paper_abstract: NPCEditor is a system for building a natural language-processing component for virtual humans capable of engaging a user in spoken dialog on a limited domain. It uses statistical language-classification technology for mapping from a user's text input to system responses. NPCEditor provides a user-friendly editor for creating effective virtual humans quickly. It has been deployed as a part of various virtual human systems in several applications.
paper_title: NPCEditor: Creating Virtual Human Dialogue Using Information Retrieval Techniques
